greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sums of squared coefficients in the negative powers of the Catalan function: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n+1} [x^(n-k+1)] 1/C(x^2)^k, where C(x) is the g.f. of A000108.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 21 2007
